headline.main: EDEN AND KORIZIS CONFER IN ATHENS; Briton Believed to Have Told Greek Premier of Turkish Attitude to Nazi Moves AFRICAN AID IS HINTED AT Neutrals Think B.E.F. May Be Sent From Wavell's Army to Help Defend Salonika

lead_paragraph: ATHENS, March 2 -- Anthony Eden, British Foreign Secretary, accompanied by General Sir John G. Dill, Chief of the Imperial General Staff; Air Vice Marshal T.W. Elmhirst and a staff of assistants, arrived in Athens from Ankara, Turkey, by air early this afternoon.
abstract: conf with Premier Korizis, Greek King and mil leaders, Athens
